info.title: sevDesk Inventory API
info.description:
# General information Welcome to our Inventory API!
You can use it to manage the inventory in your sevDesk account. # Cross-Origin Resource Sharing This API features Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).
It enables cross-domain communication from the browser.
All responses have a wildcard same-origin which makes them completely public and accessible to everyone, including any code on any site. # Embedding resources When retrieving resources by using this API, you might encounter nested resources in the resources you requested.
For example, an invoice always contains a contact, of which you can see the ID and the object name.
This API gives you the possibility to embed these resources completely into the resources you originally requested.
Taking our invoice example, this would mean, that you would not only see the ID and object name of a contact, but rather the complete contact resource. To embed resources, all you need to do is to add the query parameter 'embed' to your GET request.
As values, you can provide the name of the nested resource.
Multiple nested resources are also possible by providing multiple names, separated by a comma.

servers.description: Our main application instance which most of our customers work with
Our swiss application instance, hosted and maintained by smart seven AG

get.description: Retrieve all parts in your sevDesk inventory according to the applied filters.

parameters.name: partNumber
parameters.description: Retrieve all parts with this part number

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieve all parts with this name

category.description:
Category of the part.
For all categories, send a GET to /Category?objectType=Part

stockEnabled.description: Defines if the stock should be enabled

unity.description: The unit in which the part is measured

price.description: Price for which the part is sold

secondUnity.description: An additional unit in which the part is measured

sevClient.description: Client to which part belongs. Will be filled automatically

status.description: Status of the part. 50 <-> Inactive - 100 <-> Active

internalComment.description:
An internal comment for the part.
Does not appear on invoices and orders.

post.description: Creates a part in your sevDesk inventory.

requestBody.description:
Creation data. Please be aware, that you need to provide at least all required parameter
    of the part model!

parameters.description: ID of part for which you want the current stock.
